metadata.title: CVE-2016-9117 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Access in function imagetopnm of convert.c(jp2):1289 in OpenJPEG 2.1.2. Impact is Denial of Service. Someone must open a crafted j2k file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-1').
